snowball_cannon1.tooltip: Launching high speed snowballs with power
snowball_cannon2.tooltip: Not affected by the player's own effects
snowball_cannon3.tooltip: Snowballs can be fired directly from the snowball storage tank
snowball_cannon5.tooltip: Launching extreme speed powerful snowballs with power
obsidian_snowball.tooltip: How did you stuff it in
compacted_snowball.tooltip: Not very damaging, but extremely insulting
ice_snowball.tooltip: It doesn't matter, it's all H2O
snowball_machine_gun2.tooltip: Only snowballs from the storage tank can be launched
snowball_storage_tank1.tooltip: Left hand hold storage, Right hand hold snowballs use can be loaded into the storage
snowball_storage_tank2.tooltip: Nothing in the left hand, the right hand to use the storage can pour out snowballs
snowball_storage_tank3.tooltip: Shift press when pouring snowballs can pour all snowballs at once
black_hole_snowball1.tooltip: Starts faster when shift is pressed
LPT_snowball.tooltip: What? A missile made of water?
snowball_shotgun2.tooltip: Shot consumes snowballs when shift is pressed to provide a large thrust
snowball_shotgun3.tooltip: The amount of thrust is determined by the type of snowball consumed
can_change.tooltip: Use when shift is pressed to switch modes
empty_basin.tooltip1: Right click to load snow or powder snow
snow_block_blender1.tooltip: Turning snow block into powder snow
snow_fall_boots1.tooltip: There is no fall damage when you fall on snow
subspace_snowball1.tooltip: Throw to start damage conversion mode when shift is pressed
repulsive_field_generator1.tooltip: Long press to generate force field, release to explode repulsion
snow_golem_mode_tweaker.tooltip: Right click to adjust behavior mode
snow_golem_mode_tweaker1.tooltip: Right click when shift is pressed to adjust the target mode
snow_golem_mode_tweaker2.tooltip: Right click Advanced Snow Golem to entry settings
target_locator.tooltip: Use iron snowball as ammunition to launch positioning snowball
target_locator1.tooltip: Positioning snowball will return the target information to the locator when it hits the target
target_locator2.tooltip: Right click Advanced Snow Golem to enter target settings
smart_snow_block0.tooltip: Place a smart snow block on top of two normal snow blocks to create an Advanced Snow Golem
smart_snow_block1.tooltip: Take the gun or snowball storage tank right click Advanced Snow Golem equipment
smart_snow_block2.tooltip: Advanced Snow Golem can`t take machine guns, can`t throw snowballs without weapon
smart_snow_block3.tooltip: Unload the storage tank with empty hand right click, unload the weapon with empty hand right click when shift is pressed
smart_snow_block4.tooltip: Modify Advanced Snow Golem mode with target locator and mode tweaker
smart_snow_block5.tooltip: Feed the advanced snow golem smooth snow balls, snow blocks, and powder snow to restore life
smart_snow_block6.tooltip: Feed advanced snow golem ice to give regeneration effect
smart_snow_block7.tooltip: With the snowball can switch the advanced snow golem style
creative_snow_golem_tool.tooltip: Right click advanced snow golem to open enhanced mode
creative_snow_golem_tool1.tooltip: Right click advanced snow golem copy when shift is pressed, right click cube generation
thrust_snowball1.tooltip: Non-firing, only snowball shotgun generates thrust
thrust_snowball2.tooltip: Snowball shotgun recoil will be the priority consumption of thrust snowball
